Text: Sorry, I'm having some issues getting it to seed from here.  So if anyone has it downloaded then please seed it for the weekend while I resolve the issues.

This forgets pretty much the most important thing first of all it didint work for me then i did some testing reinstalled a couple times to find a problem and i did... It MUST be installed to C:\Program Files\Lionhead Studios\Black & White 2 (The game ofc) for it to work if it isint it aint gonna help you. Hope this helps ppl wich dont know how to get it working :)

I looked at my stats, I have a 20/1 ratio of adults and children. I zoom in on my town, its just stockpiled full of children.
Works perfectly, my kids are now aging! Ignore the comment by ellisdee703, the torrent contains one exe called "white.exe" which is the one you use to replace the old one. Works great.
